org.openmobster.cloud.api.location
Interface LocationServiceBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
GetPlaceDetails, RestaurantBean
public interface LocationServiceBean

Represents a service side Location Service Bean component. This components receives remote coarse grain location-oriented invocations from the devices It is to be used by Developers to integrate contextual Location data with backend Enterprise data

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com

Method Summary
 Response invoke(LocationContext locationContext, Request request)
          Receives service invocations from the device side
 

Method Detail

invoke

Response invoke(LocationContext locationContext,
                Request request)
Receives service invocations from the device side

Parameters:
contextual - location information associated with the device in real time
request - service request
Returns:
service response with appropriate data within the context of the application
